questions.question_text: In a series RLC circuit, the impedance is minimum at:
questions.explanation: At resonant frequency, XL = XC, so impedance Z = R (minimum value)

questions.question_text: A 3-phase balanced load draws 10A line current from 400V supply at 0.8 pf. Calculate total power.
